heroSection.title: Mern Stack Developer
heroSection.name: Karim Omran
heroSection.description: A passionate mern stack developer who loves creating digital solutions and building complete web applications. Always eager to learn and grow, with a goal of delivering simple and valuable user experiences, whether working independently or as part of a team.

servicesSection.title: Frontend Development
servicesSection.description: I create responsive, clean, and modern front-end designs.

servicesSection.title: Backend Development
servicesSection.description: I build robust, scalable, and efficient server-side applications.

servicesSection.title: Relational Databases
servicesSection.description: Design and manage structured databases using SQL MySQL.

servicesSection.title: Non-Relational Databases
servicesSection.description: Work with flexible NoSQL databases like MongoDB.

servicesSection.title: Web Testing
servicesSection.description: I ensure functionality, usability, performance, security, and compatibility.

servicesSection.title: SEO
servicesSection.description: I optimize websites for better visibility, traffic, rankings, engagement, and conversion.

projects.title: Games
projects.description: Games is an interactive platform that offers a wide range of games for all interests in one place.

projects.title: Recipe
projects.description: Recipe is a modern and responsive web application built with React and Vite, designed to help users discover and explore various food recipes easily.

projects.title: Fresh Cart
projects.description: FreshCart is a fast, responsive e-commerce app with a clean and seamless shopping experience.
